body_html:
The original PR is now migrated to contrib. Note that:

  • I haven't really got my head around bazel yet so the BUILD files are copied together from different modules in contrib. They can likely be condensed.
  • The ZMQ dependency is still in the main tensorflow/workspace.bzl.

@mrry do you want to merge the existing interface into contrib first and then move to the constructor/accessor design in a subsequent PR?
body_text:
The original PR is now migrated to contrib. Note that:

I haven't really got my head around bazel yet so the BUILD files are copied together from different modules in contrib. They can likely be condensed.
The ZMQ dependency is still in the main tensorflow/workspace.bzl.

@mrry do you want to merge the existing interface into contrib first and then move to the constructor/accessor design in a subsequent PR?
body:
The original PR is now migrated to `contrib`. Note that:

* I haven't really got my head around `bazel` yet so the `BUILD` files are copied together from different modules in `contrib`. They can likely be condensed.
* The ZMQ dependency is still in the main `tensorflow/workspace.bzl`. 

@mrry do you want to merge the existing interface into `contrib` first and then move to the constructor/accessor design in a subsequent PR?
